Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd Street Beach
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rrtd EB: will only provide service up to Stony Island; WB: Stony Island, 64th, Blackstone, 63rd; due to street blockage at 63rd Street Beach

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd Street Beach due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will only provide service up to Stony Island.

Westbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 64th, Blackstone, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted EB: will provide service up to Exchange; WB: Exchange, 76th, Yates & 75th: due to street blockage near 75th/Lake Front

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 75th/Lake Front due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will only provide service up to Exchange.

Westbound buses will operate via Exchange, 76th, Yates, then resume their normal route on 75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 35th/Lake Front
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses will only provide service up to 35th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses will only provide service up to 35th/Cottage Grove.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
